name: Cairn (Yliader)
description:
Cairn is a platformer made on GB-Studio, created by Chris Maltby, and using some plugins from Pau Thomas (thanks for them !).

You are Amber, a young novice who must prove herself to become a confirmed priestess.

Explore a labyrinthic temple shared by three goddesses, and regain their power to escape safely.

It's a game that I've been developping alone since 2 years . It's a puzzle game, no enemies to defeat except your own mind.

The game is on its way, I spent a lot of time doing all the concepts arts and working on the narration, to have a very precise idea of what I have to do now. I started scripting and drawing from November, spending about 1-2 hours per scene, and more to code.

A large part of the lore and advices for the puzzles are inside the stories of every objects, so keep an eye in the menues.

What do I want to do with it

I want to share it like my 2 other games : free price in digital release, and the less price in physical release.

But for that, I need all the help that you can give. So if the project please you, and if you can do it, give something. Even 2€ could be good (it's the BEST) !

I don't want to do kickstarter or other things simply because I clearly don't have the time and the strenght to manage it, but I never wanted to keep my skils for me (you can go to my github to see all my projects on open source).

Thanks !
